=Image URL Transloading=

The image URL transloading API allows you to instantly move an image from one web host to another.

==Details==

*URL:* http://imgur.com/api/upload/

*Method:* GET (HTTP)

==Parameters==

    * 'url' - A URL to an image.
    * 'edit' - Whether or not to edit the image before uploading.

==Implementation==

Just point your browser to this URL http://imgur.com/api/upload/?url=URL_HERE with the URL you wish to [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Transload transload]. Alternatively, you can point your browser to http://imgur.com/api/upload/?edit&url=URL_HERE if you wish to edit the image first. No developer API key is necessary.

==Limitations==

Transloading an image requires the use of [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTTP_cookie cookies] - or more specifically, [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Session_%28computer_science%29 sessions] - and will not work if the browser does not support them or if they are disabled.

==Sample Code==

*HTML Link*
{{{
<a href="http://imgur.com/api/upload/?url=http://example.com/image.jpg">Transload Image</a>
}}}
{{{
<a href="http://imgur.com/api/upload/?edit&url=http://example.com/image.jpg">Transload and Edit Image</a>
}}}

*PHP*
{{{
header("Location: http://imgur.com/api/upload/?url=http://example.com/image.jpg");
}}}
{{{
header("Location: http://imgur.com/api/upload/?edit&url=http://example.com/image.jpg");
}}}
